attributes.action: To null and void the Brexit referendom due a main issue being a mistake
attributes.additional_details: The issue in question is that £350 million pounds a week spent on the EU would be channeled into the NHS. This was only admitted as a mistake minutes after the referendum result was announced. Due to the severity of this mistake rectification is required to ensure a democratic result is acheived, therefore the referendum of June 23rd 2016 needs to be null and void.
attributes.background: We the undersigned would like to make the Brexit referendum null and void as one of the main issues raised by the leave campaign was based on a mistake which mislead the electotate.
